Pre-Game Insights: Cleveland Cavaliers (12-0, first in the Eastern Conference) vs. Philadelphia 76ers (2-8, 14th in the Eastern Conference)
Philadelphia went 47-35 overall, 31-21 in Eastern Conference play and 25-16 at home during the 2023-24 season.
Cleveland finished 48-34 overall and 31-21 in Eastern Conference action during the 2023-24 season.
Philadelphia averaged 8.5 steals, 6.0 blocks and 11.3 turnovers per game last season.
Cleveland averaged 7.4 steals, 4.6 blocks and 12.7 turnovers per game last season.
Tyrese Maxey is out (hamstring) for the 76ers.
Jarrett Allen is day to day (leg), Emoni Bates is out (knee), Max Strus is out (ankle), Sam Merrill is day to day (ankle) for the Cavaliers.
